Package gamelogic.board

Class BoardMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.board.BoardMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Board
    public class BoardMethod
extends java.lang.Object
implements Board
    Board for the pentago game. Module 2 programming project

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoardMethod()
      Creates an empty board.

      Checks whether there is a column on the board which have 5 of the same mark in a row in the column

      Checks whether there is a diagonal on the board which have 5 of the same mark in a row in the diagonal

      • rotatePart

        public void rotatePart​(int rotation)
        Used to rotate a particular sub-board of the board. rotation = 0 is rotating the top left sub-board counter-clockwise rotation = 1 is rotating the top left sub-board clockwise rotation = 2 is rotating the top right sub-board counter-clockwise rotation = 3 is rotating the top right sub-board clockwise rotation = 4 is rotating the bottom left sub-board counter-clockwise rotation = 5 is rotating the bottom left sub-board clockwise rotation = 6 is rotating the bottom right sub-board counter-clockwise rotation = 7 is rotating the bottom right sub-board clockwise
        Specified by:
        rotatePart in interface Board
        Parameters:
        rotation - the rotation number

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Tests if the whole board is full.
        Specified by:
        isFull in interface Board
        Returns:
        true if all fields are occupied

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Returns true if the game is over. The game is over when there is a winner or the whole board is full.
        Specified by:
        gameOver in interface Board
        Returns:
        true if the game is over

      • hasWinner

        public boolean hasWinner()
        Returns true if the game has a winner. This is the case when one of the marks controls at least one row, column or diagonal. To control a row, column or diagonal the player must have 5 in a row in either of them.
        Specified by:
        hasWinner in interface Board
        Returns:
        true if the game has a winner

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner​(Mark mark)
        Checks if the mark has won. A mark wins if it controls at least one row, column or diagonal.
        Specified by:
        isWinner in interface Board
        Parameters:
        mark - the mark of interest
        Returns:
        true if the mark has won

      • hasRow

        public boolean hasRow​(Mark mark)

        Specified by:
        hasRow in interface Board
        Parameters:
        mark - the Mark of interest
        Returns:
        true if there is a row controlled by mark
